author: cmlenz
msg: Remove the getContextPath() method from the Container interface.
The context path is now determined by the <cactus> task, depending on whether a EAR or a WAR is going to be deployed:
- If we're deploying a EAR, the context path is extracted from the application deployment descriptor
- If we're deploying a WAR, the context path is the name of the archive minus the extension

author: cmlenz
msg: The <xmlcatalog> and the web-app DTDs are not needed anymore, because the DTDs can now be resolved from the classpath

author: cmlenz
msg: The getResource() method has moved into the JarArchive class

author: cmlenz
msg: The functionality to parse a deployment descriptor inside a EAR or WAR has been moved into the EarArchive and WarArchive classes, respectively
